trans-unit.source: Provides standard facilities for creating and managing a type-safe, ordered collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRow"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 建立和管理型別安全及經過排序的集合提供標準的設備<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRow"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This collection supports standard zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 此集合可支援標準的以零為起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup.Rows%2A> property provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup> class returns a TableRowCollection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup.Rows%2A>屬性所提供<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup>類別會傳回 TableRowCollection。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: Appends a specified item to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的項目附加至集合。

trans-unit.source: A table row to append to the collection or rows.
trans-unit.target: 要附加至集合或資料列資料表資料列。

trans-unit.source: Raised when *item* already belongs to a collection.
trans-unit.target: 引發的時機*項目*已屬於集合。

trans-unit.source: Raised when *item* is **null**.
trans-unit.target: 引發的時機*項目*是**null**。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the pre-allocated collection item capacity for this collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個集合的預先配置的集合項目容量。

trans-unit.source: The Capacity property represents the number of pre-allocated slots for storing items in this collection, whereas the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Count%2A> property represents the actual number of items currently in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 容量屬性表示的預先配置位置儲存在集合中，項目數目，而<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Count%2A>屬性表示的目前集合中的項目實際數目。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of Capacity is always at least as large as the value of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 一定是容量的至少<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Count%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Count%2A>值一樣大值

trans-unit.source: When newly added collection items cause the collection count to exceed the collection capacity, the capacity is automatically increased to accommodate the newly added collection items.
trans-unit.target: 當新加入的集合項目造成集合計數超過集合的容量，容量會自動增加以容納新加入的集合項目。

trans-unit.source: Increasing the collection capacity involves allocating additional collection slots, which incurs both performance and memory overhead.
trans-unit.target: 增加集合容量包括配置額外的集合的位置，而造成效能與記憶體額外負荷。

trans-unit.source: Use the Capacity property to optimize the collection capacity in cases where the total or maximum number of collection items is known in advance.
trans-unit.target: 若要最佳化集合中的容量集合項目總計或最大數目事先知道的情況下使用容量屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.TrimToSize%2A> method to cause the collection capacity to equalized with the current collection count.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.TrimToSize%2A>方法，讓集合能力與目前的集合計數 equalized。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.TrimToSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The pre-allocated collection item capacity for this collection.
trans-unit.target: 此集合的項目容量預先配置的集合。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **8**.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是**8**。

trans-unit.source: Raised when an attempt is made to set <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCellCollection.Capacity*> to a value that is less than the current value of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableCellCollection.Count*>.
trans-unit.target: 當嘗試設定時，引發<> *> 值小於目前的值，這個值以<> *>。

trans-unit.source: Clears all items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 清除集合中的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: After calling Clear, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Count%2A> property becomes **0** and the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Capacity%2A> property is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 清除，呼叫的值之後<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Count%2A>屬性變成**0**和值<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Capacity%2A>屬性不變。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Capacity%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set a new capacity, call <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.TrimToSize%2A> or explicitly set a new capacity through the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Capacity%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定新的容量，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.TrimToSize%2A>或明確設定新的容量，透過<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Capacity%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Capacity%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.TrimToSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Queries for the presence of a specified item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 指定的項目集合中存在的查詢。

trans-unit.source: An item to query for the presence of in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要查詢集合中出現的項目。

trans-unit.source: **true** if the specified *item* is present in the collection; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果指定*項目*存在於集合中; 否則**false**。

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of the collection and inserts them into a specified array starting at a specified index position in the array.
trans-unit.target: 複製集合的內容，並將它們插入到指定的陣列，從陣列中指定的索引位置開始。

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional array to which the collection contents will be copied.
trans-unit.target: 集合內容複製到其中的一維陣列。

trans-unit.source: This array must use zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 這個陣列必須使用以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index in `array` specifying the position at which to begin inserting the copied collection objects.
trans-unit.target: 中以零為起始的索引`array`指定開始插入所複製之集合物件的位置。

trans-unit.source: Raised when *array* includes items that are not compatible with the type <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRow"></xref>, or if *arrayIndex* specifies a position that falls outside of the bounds of *array*.
trans-unit.target: 引發的時機*陣列*包含與類型不相容的項目<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRow"> </xref>，或如果*arrayIndex*指定超出範圍的位置*陣列*。

trans-unit.source: Raised when *array* is **null**.
trans-unit.target: 引發的時機*陣列*是**null**。

trans-unit.source: Raised when *arrayIndex* is less than **0**.
trans-unit.target: 引發的時機*arrayIndex*是小於**0**。

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of the collection and inserts them into a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRow"></xref> array of starting at a specified index position in the array.
trans-unit.target: 複製集合的內容，並將它們插入到指定<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRow"></xref>陣列的陣列中指定的索引位置開始。

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRow"></xref> array to which the collection contents will be copied.
trans-unit.target: 一維<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRow"></xref>集合內容複製到陣列。

trans-unit.source: This array must use zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 這個陣列必須使用以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index in `array` specifying the position at which to begin inserting the copied collection objects.
trans-unit.target: 中以零為起始的索引`array`指定開始插入所複製之集合物件的位置。

trans-unit.source: Raised when *array* includes items that are not compatible with the type <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRow"></xref>, or if *arrayIndex* specifies a position that falls outside of the bounds of *array*.
trans-unit.target: 引發的時機*陣列*包含與類型不相容的項目<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRow"> </xref>，或如果*arrayIndex*指定超出範圍的位置*陣列*。

trans-unit.source: Raised when *array* is **null**.
trans-unit.target: 引發的時機*陣列*是**null**。

trans-unit.source: Raised when *arrayIndex* is less than **0**.
trans-unit.target: 引發的時機*arrayIndex*是小於**0**。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items currently contained by the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前集合中所包含的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Capacity%2A> property represents the number of pre-allocated slots for storing items in this collection, whereas the Count property represents the actual number of items currently in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Capacity%2A>屬性表示的預先配置位置儲存在集合中，項目數目，而則 Count 屬性表示的目前集合中的項目實際數目。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Capacity%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Capacity%2A> is always at least as large as the value of Count.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Capacity%2A>一律為至少和計數的值一樣大。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Capacity%2A>

trans-unit.source: When newly added collection items cause the collection count to exceed the collection capacity, the capacity is automatically increased to accommodate the newly added collection items.
trans-unit.target: 當新加入的集合項目造成集合計數超過集合的容量，容量會自動增加以容納新加入的集合項目。

trans-unit.source: Increasing the collection capacity involves allocating additional collection slots, which incurs both performance and memory overhead.
trans-unit.target: 增加集合容量包括配置額外的集合的位置，而造成效能與記憶體額外負荷。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Capacity%2A> property to optimize the collection capacity in cases where the total or maximum number of collection items is known in advance.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Capacity%2A>最佳化集合中的容量集合項目總計或最大數目事先知道的情況下的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Capacity%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.TrimToSize%2A> method to cause the collection capacity to equalized with the current collection count.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.TrimToSize%2A>方法，讓集合能力與目前的集合計數 equalized。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.TrimToSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of items currently contained by the collection.
trans-unit.target: 目前集合中所包含的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the zero-based index of specified collection item.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的集合之項目的以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: A collection item to return the index of.
trans-unit.target: 若要傳回的索引集合項目。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the specified collection item, or **-1** if the specified item is not a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 指定的集合項目的以零起始的索引或**-1**如果指定的項目不是集合的成員。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a specified item in the collection at a specified index position.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的項目插入位於指定的索引位置的集合。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Count%2A> equals <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Capacity%2A> for this collection, the collection capacity automatically is increased before the new item is inserted.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Count%2A>等於<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Capacity%2A>此集合，集合容量自動會增加插入新項目之前。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Capacity%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set *index* equal to the value of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Count%2A>, to append a new collection item to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 設定*索引*的值等於<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Count%2A>，以新的集合項目附加至集合。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Indices for existing collection items may be adjusted to accommodate the newly inserted collection item.
trans-unit.target: 可調整現有的集合項目的索引，以容納新插入的集合項目。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index that specifies the position in the collection at which to insert `item`.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引，指定要插入集合中的位置`item`。

trans-unit.source: An item to insert into the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要插入至集合的項目。

trans-unit.source: Raised when *index* is less than **0**.
trans-unit.target: 引發的時機*索引*是小於**0**。

trans-unit.source: Raised when *item* is **null**.
trans-unit.target: 引發的時機*項目*是**null**。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類型或成員支援[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基礎結構，不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: Currently, this property always returns **false**.
trans-unit.target: 目前，這個屬性永遠傳回**false**。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類型或成員支援[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基礎結構，不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: Currently, this property always returns **false**.
trans-unit.target: 目前，這個屬性永遠傳回**false**。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection item at a specified index.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定索引處的集合項目。

trans-unit.source: This is an indexed property.
trans-unit.target: 這是索引的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This is an indexed property that supports standard indexing syntax (similar to that used to access a particular cell in an array).
trans-unit.target: 這是支援的標準索引的語法 （類似於用來存取陣列中的特定資料格） 的索引的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index specifying the position of the collection item to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引，指定要擷取集合項目的位置。

trans-unit.source: The collection item at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 指定索引的集合項目。

trans-unit.source: Raised when *index* is less than zero, or when *index* is greater than or equal to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Count*>.
trans-unit.target: 引發的時機*索引*小於零，或當*索引*大於或等於<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Count*>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Count*>

trans-unit.source: Removes a specified item from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中移除指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: Indices for remaining collection items may be adjusted to reflect the removed collection item.
trans-unit.target: 可調整剩餘的集合項目的索引，以反映已移除的集合項目。

trans-unit.source: An item to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要從集合中移除的項目。

trans-unit.source: **true** if the specified item was found and removed; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果指定的項目已找到並移除，否則**false**。

trans-unit.source: Raised if *item* is not present in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 時引發*項目*不存在於集合中。

trans-unit.source: Raised when *item* is **null**.
trans-unit.target: 引發的時機*項目*是**null**。

trans-unit.source: Removes an item, specified by index, from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 項目，指定的索引，從集合中移除。

trans-unit.source: Indices for remaining collection items may be adjusted to reflect the removed collection item.
trans-unit.target: 可調整剩餘的集合項目的索引，以反映已移除的集合項目。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index that specifies the collection item to remove.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引，指定要移除的集合項目。

trans-unit.source: Raised when *index* is less than zero, or when *index* is greater than or equal to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Count*>.
trans-unit.target: 引發的時機*索引*小於零，或當*索引*大於或等於<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Count*>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Count*>

trans-unit.source: Removes a range of items, specified by beginning index and count, from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 移除指定的項目，由索引和計數，從集合開頭的範圍。

trans-unit.source: Indices for remaining collection items may be adjusted to reflect the removed collection items.
trans-unit.target: 可調整剩餘的集合項目的索引，以反映已移除的集合項目。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index indicating the beginning of a range of items to remove.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引，表示要移除的項目範圍的開頭。

trans-unit.source: The number of items to remove, beginning form the position specified by `index`.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除，開頭表單所指定的位置的項目數`index`。

trans-unit.source: Raised when *index* or *count* is less than zero, or when *index* is greater than or equal to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Count*>.
trans-unit.target: 引發的時機*索引*或*計數*小於零，或當*索引*大於或等於<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Count*>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Count*>

trans-unit.source: Raised when *index* and *count* do not specify a valid range in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 引發的時機*索引*和*計數*此集合中未指定有效的範圍。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類型或成員支援[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基礎結構，不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 物件，可用來對集合進行同步存取。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>介面。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>可用來逐一查看集合的物件。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面。</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection>

trans-unit.target: 使用型別安全<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Add%2A>方法而。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>加入<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection"> </xref>。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The position into which the new element was inserted.
trans-unit.target: 插入新項目的位置。

trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.IList.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面。</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection>

trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Collections.IList>介面。</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: Optimizes memory consumption for the collection by setting the underlying collection <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Capacity*> equal to the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection.Count*> of items currently in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 藉由設定基礎集合以最佳化記憶體耗用量集合<> *> 等於<> *> 的目前集合中的項目。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to minimize memory overhead for a collection, particularly if the set of items contained by the collection is expected to be static.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以用來為集合的記憶體負擔降至最低，特別是當集合中所包含的項目組必須是靜態。
